item.title: Israel reopens Gaza's key Rafah border crossing with Egypt
item.description: Only dozens of Palestinians and no goods will be able to cross in both directions each day.

item.title: Bad Bunny makes Grammy history as stars protest against ICE
item.description: Other prizes went to Billie Eilish, Olivia Dean and Lady Gaga, at a ceremony dominated by politics.

item.title: Partial US government shutdown enters third day as funding standoff continues
item.description: Democrats want changes in funding to the Department of Homeland Security in light of the fatal shootings of two US citizens during immigration raids.

item.title: Candidate tough on crime wins Costa Rica presidential election
item.description: Laura Fern√°ndez won the election outright in the first round amid concern about a rise in organised crime.

item.title: Watch: Snake at train station scares Sydney commuters
item.description: People were seen running away as soon as they came across the venomous snake.
